ing: 2 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened lemon-lime flavored drink mix (such as KOOL-AIDÂ®)
1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime soda (such as SpriteÂ®), chilled
des:
"My Grandma always made this for any get-together we had down on the farm. Fast, easy, and great tasting punch! 
Wouldn't have a party without it!"
ins:
Mix lemon-lime drink mix, sugar, cold water, and pineapple juice in a large bowl until sugar and drink mix have dissolved; refrigerate until cold, about 1 hour.
Gently stir lemon-lime soda into the punch just before serving.
